caseData.title: Case Title 1
caseData.eventDescription: Case setup 1 Case crisis 1 Case outcome 1

expertAnalyses.expertName: Dr. Ilana Zehav (Cognitive Psychologist, Tel Aviv University)
expertAnalyses.analysis: The problem is mainly technical - the committee did not receive enough information or did not process it properly.

expertAnalyses.expertName: Prof. Ron Cohen (Social Psychologist, Hebrew University)
expertAnalyses.analysis: The case demonstrates how cohesive groups develop defense mechanisms against threatening information and make poor decisions.

expertAnalyses.expertName: Dr. Amit Barak (Management Researcher, Tel Aviv-Yafo College)
expertAnalyses.analysis: This is a case of an inefficient hierarchical structure that prevents the flow of information from the bottom up.
